alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Calcasieu; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 29 at 9:40PM CDT until March 30 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 5 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Rapides, Calcasieu, Vernon, Beauregard, Allen, West Cameron, East Cameron and Jefferson Davis Parishes. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 11 AM to 5 PM CDT Wednesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 11 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Calcasieu; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Vernon; West Cameron
